# Build your Android Wallet

In this section, you will find all the resources needed to build your own Android Wallet application using the tools and libraries provided by the EUDI Wallet Reference Implementation.

Let's start with your implementation!

| Description | Get Started |
| --- |--- |
| Reference Implementation Wallet Application |[Android Wallet](./wallet-application-level/index.md)|
| Reference Implementation Core | [Android Core](./library-level/index.md) |
